articles.title: "After Chandrayaan, South Africa's Ramaphosa Wanted To Sit Next To Modi": S Jaishankar - NDTV
articles.description: The $75 million Chandrayaan-3 Moon mission was acclaimed by space agencies and governments across the world and also prompted several positive reactions from BRICS leaders at the summit in South Africa attended by PM Narendra Modi.
articles.content:
The BRICS Summit hosted by South Africa was the first in-person meet since 2019.
New Delhi: Chandrayaan-3. The answer to the question - 'Why did South Africa President Cyril Ramaphosa want to sit ne… [+3292 chars]
